page.title: 04Brook Hollows Spinney
page.content: The brook passes through Brook Hollows, which is also known as the Spinney.This was bought by Rolleston Civic Trust around 1970.The lake,then known as the fish pond, was silted up and J.C.B cleaned it out with experimental machinery.Wildfowl and swans live on the lake and there are many types of wildflower,trees and birds. _ PUBS AND HOTELS_ _TheÂ£ Brookhouse Inn'_ The Â£Brookhouse Inn'used to be a farm butis now a fifst class hotel.It is very expensive and only wealthy people can afford staying in it.The people of Rolleston often see helicopters landing in the back garden.
